translation.en: [male voice whispers] Good luck, baby Willa.
translation.es: Buena suerte, bebé Willa. PROPIEDAD DE WILLOW WARD

translation.en: -[dramatic music plays] -[wind blows]
[man] Chili-chili-chila! Willi-willi-Willa!
Birthday chili brewed to perfection!
translation.es: Chile con carne hecho a la perfección.

translation.en: I'm so proud my birthday girl
ordered her dad's special chili for her birthday dinner.
translation.es: pidiera el chile especial de papápara su cumpleaños.

translation.en: -Wouldn't be my birthday without it. -Oh.
translation.es: No sería mi cumpleaños sin él.

translation.en: Now, I know you wanted a phone, but I think…
translation.es: Ahora, sé que querías un teléfono, pero creo…

translation.en: you're going to like this even more.
translation.es: que esto te gustará mucho más.

translation.en: Come on, open it!
Whoa. "Property of Willow Ward."
-[soft music plays] -[dad] It was your mom's.
She wanted you to have it when you were old enough to know what to do with it.
translation.es: Quería que lo tuvierascuando supieras qué hacer con él.

translation.en: [inhales] Now I'm no fashion expert, but I figured 12 years old,
translation.es: No soy experto en moda, pero a los 12 años

translation.en: you're old enough to know how to wear a necklace.
translation.es: eres ya mayor para usar un collar.

translation.en: She used to pull my leg and tell me it was magic.
translation.es: Solía bromear y decíaque era un collar mágico.

translation.en: Your mom would always say,
"Believe in magic and life will be magical."
translation.es: "Cree en la magia… y la vida será mágica".

translation.en: -Can you help me put it on? -Yeah.
[takes deep breath] So, how do I look?
As beautiful as your mom,
and she was the most beautiful woman in the world.
translation.es: Era la mujer más bella del mundo.

translation.en: Thank you for trusting me with this, Dad. I'll wear it forever.
translation.es: Gracias por confiarme esto, papá.Lo usaré por siempre.

translation.en: Happy birthday, sweetheart.
Chili. Chili. [laughs]
[dad] Okay, birthday girl,
translation.es: Bien, cumpleañera,será mejor que te prepares

translation.en: you better put on a jacket because this stuff is chili.
translation.es: Bien, cumpleañera,será mejor que te prepares porque esto es chile.

translation.en: It couldn't be. After all this time.
translation.es: No puede ser, después de tanto tiempo…

translation.en: Looks like they didn't leave it with great-uncle William.
translation.es: Parece que no lo dejaroncon el tío abuelo William.

translation.en: Scratch another loser off the list.
translation.es: Un perdedor menos en la lista.

translation.en: Twelve years of searching and another dead end.
translation.es: Doce años de búsqueda y otro callejón sin salida.¡Nunca lo encontraremos a tiempo!

translation.en: We'll never find it in time.
translation.es: y otro callejón sin salida.¡Nunca lo encontraremos a tiempo!

translation.en: I don't know, Wilma.
Maybe if you chipped in and did a little digging, we might just find it, okay?
translation.es: si ayudas y cavas un poco,podríamos encontrarlo, ¿sí?

translation.en: Oh yeah. Huh, that's a huge help.
Oh. Wait, wait, wait.
Was that…?
Could it be?
I think it was. -[crow] It is! It's back in Winding Way. -[gasps]
translation.es: - Creo que sí.- ¡Sí! ¡Está de vuelta en Camino Sinuoso.

translation.en: I nearly blew off my perch. The amulet has resurfaced and you'll never guess where.
translation.es: Casi rompo mi percha.El amuleto ha resurgido. Nunca adivinarán dónde.

translation.en: Does this mean we can stop digging?
Don't count your eyeballs before they blink, Sneak, but, as they say, maybe.
translation.es: No cuentes con ello, Sneak,pero como dicen, tal vez.

translation.en: You found the amulet?
Hey, what are you doing? Stop.
Uh-oh. Let's get out of here.
-[dramatic music plays] -So long, mortal.
I still can't believe it was under our noses this whole time.
translation.es: No puedo creer que estuvierabajo nuestras narices todo este tiempo.

translation.en: Right there.
Like, right there, in Willow's very house.
translation.es: Como en la casa… de Willow.

translation.en: -Bright side… -Hm?
translation.es: Por el lado bueno,al menos lo encontramos.

translation.en: -At least we found it. -Oh, is that the bright side?
translation.es: Por el lado bueno,al menos lo encontramos. ¿Ese es el lado bueno?Desperdiciamos, no sé,

translation.en: -Yeah. -Is it? Because we wasted, I don't know,
translation.es: ¿Ese es el lado bueno?Desperdiciamos, no sé,

translation.en: over ten years of our lives looking for it, so…
translation.es: diez años de nuestra vida buscándolo.

translation.en: [inhales] It's fine.
Sticky-Paws Fink,
tomorrow you do what you do best.
translation.es: mañana harás lo que mejor sabes hacer.

translation.en: Whatever you need, boss. Fink will not let you down.
translation.es: Lo que necesites, jefa. Fink no te decepcionará.

translation.en: And finally…
the amulet will be ours.
Alright, let's go in.
[caws] I guess I'll just stay out here.
-Oh, hey, let's get this party started. -[laughs]
Sorry I'm late, but coordinating for a slumber party requires a lot of planning.
translation.es: Perdón la tardanza. Coordinaruna pijamada requiere planificación.

translation.en: Scout, you're not late. You're 30 seconds early.
translation.es: Scout, no llegas tarde.Llegas 30 segundos antes.

translation.en: Whew. You know I detest lateness.
Lucy!
Let the Willa Ward birthday bonanza begin!
translation.es: ¡Que comiencela bonanza de cumpleaños de Willa!

translation.en: -[laughs] -I couldn't find my bike anywhere. -I had to use my little brother's. -[laughs]
translation.es: No pude encontrar mi bicicleta,tuve que usar la de mi hermanito.

translation.en: Look Mr. Ward, can we cut to the chase?
Everyone knows in your line of business, your loot bags are the best.
translation.es: Es sabido que, en su línea de negocio,sus bolsas son las mejores.

translation.en: It'd be amazing if we could break tradition and get into them a little early.
translation.es: Sería increíble si pudiéramos romperla tradición y tenerlas antes.

translation.en: Oh Scout, you know flattery gets me every time.
translation.es: Oh, Scout,sabes que la adulación siempre funciona.

translation.en: Hey, I didn't get into the candy business for nothing, huh?
translation.es: No me metí en el negocio de los dulcespor nada. ¡Vamos a buscar el botín!

translation.en: -Let's go get some loot! Ha ha! -[cheering]
translation.es: No me metí en el negocio de los dulcespor nada. ¡Vamos a buscar el botín! - ¡Increíble!- ¡Vengan!

translation.en: There we are.
-Dad, I think they know. -Come on, Willa.
translation.es: - Papá, creo que lo saben.- No, vamos.

translation.en: -Ugh, fine. [groans] -Don't wanna waste it.
This is the best candy ever.
Your dad slays it with the loot bags.
translation.es: Tu papá es genialcon las bolsas de dulces.

translation.en: Hey, girls. You sure you want to sleep up in the attic tonight?
translation.es: Chicas, ¿quieren dormiren el ático esta noche?

translation.en: Yeah, Dad. It's way more fun to tell ghost stories up here.
translation.es: Sí, papá. Es más divertidocontar historias de fantasmas aquí.

translation.en: Okay. Well nothing too spooky, okay? And lights out by midnight.
translation.es: Bueno, nada muy espeluznante, ¿sí?Y las luces apagadas a medianoche.

translation.en: Love you.
Love you, Dad.
Ready?
It was hers.
My dad wanted to wait until I was old enough so I could take good care of it.
translation.es: Mi papá quería esperarhasta que tuviera edad para cuidarlo.

translation.en: [Scout] Your mom had amazing taste.
translation.es: Tu mamá tenía un gusto increíble.

translation.en: -That is so vintage. -[laughing]
You never really talk about her.
I don't know much about her.
I would like to know more, but…
translation.es: Me gustaría saber más,pero me preocupa que papá se ponga triste

translation.en: I'm worried it makes Dad sad if I'm always asking questions.
translation.es: Me gustaría saber más,pero me preocupa que papá se ponga triste si siempre hago preguntas.

translation.en: Besides, it feels like she's right here with us anyway.
translation.es: Además, parece que está aquí con nosotros.

translation.en: What's taking him so long?
Never send a rat to do a cat's job.
translation.es: Nunca mandes a una rataa hacer el trabajo de un gato.

translation.en: He's probably messing up as we speak.
translation.es: Debe estar metiendo la pataen este momento.

translation.en: Come on.
Since Halloween is coming, this one is all about
translation.es: Como ya viene el Halloween, esta es sobre la leyendade las tres brujas de Camino Sinuoso.

translation.en: [in a spooky voice] the legend of the Three Witches of Winding Way.
translation.es: esta es sobre la leyendade las tres brujas de Camino Sinuoso.

translation.en: You know that legend is totally made up, right?
translation.es: Sabes que esa leyenda es inventada, ¿no?

translation.en: [in a ghostly voice] Who says?
What was that?
[Lucy] What was that?
Oh, you were so not supposed to see me.
What? Did you just… talk?
Oops.
Sorry to interrupt. [chuckles] Pay no attention. You, you go back to what you were… doing.
translation.es: Perdón por interrumpir.Ignórenme, sigan en lo que estaban.

translation.en: What's with all the screaming? You're scaring me.
Wait. He has my necklace!
Eek! Bye.
Where did it go?
-Ew. -[Fink] Just forget I was ever here.
Why is it talking?
[whimpers] I am so not touching that thing.
No touching. Just…
Get my necklace back.
We have to find it.
Bless you.
Thanks.
-[Scout gasps] Found him! -[yelps]
-Corner him! -Ha! Trapped like a rat.
That is my mom's necklace.
translation.es: Es el collar de mi mamá.

translation.en: -[Willa] Drop it. -[fizzling]
-Oh, no. Uh-oh. That's not right. -[mystical music plays]
translation.es: Ay, no. Esto no está bien. Ya lo solté. ¡Lo solté!

translation.en: I dropped it already. I dropped it.
translation.es: Esto no está bien. Ya lo solté. ¡Lo solté!

translation.en: What is happening?
Willa!
Stop, broom.
[yells] Stop!
What was that?
I have no idea.
Terrifying is what it was.
[groaning] Look out!
I gotta get out of here.
-[laughs] See ya later, kids. -No!
-[grunting] -Gotcha.
Nothing? How about this? [growls]
Nope, nope, nope.
-Come on, let me out! -Let's hide.
You give me back my necklace, I'll give you back your freedom.
translation.es: Si me devuelves mi collar,te devolveré tu libertad.

translation.en: Uh, look, I wish I could, but it's a long story. Trust me.
translation.es: Mira, ojalá pudiera,pero es una larga historia. Créeme.

translation.en: Then you'll have to stay in this jar forever,
translation.es: Pues te quedarásen este frasco para siempre,

translation.en: and soon, you'll get really hungry.
-[Willa] So, do we have a deal? -[groaning] Oh, alright, you got a deal.
translation.es: ¿Tenemos un trato? Está bien. Trato hecho.

translation.en: -Who are you anyway? -[mumbles through sealed lips]
Fine. Don't tell me.
But you're lucky I love animals, or tonight wouldn't have ended so well for you.
translation.es: Tienes suerte de que amo a los animaleso esta noche no habría terminado bien.

translation.en: Oh, Willa. [chuckles] You're just like your mom. Heart of gold.
translation.es: Willa. Eres como tu mamá, de gran corazón.

translation.en: Wait, did you just say I'm just like… my mom?
translation.es: Espera, ¿dijiste que soy como… mi mamá?

translation.en: Fink, what's taking so long?
Gotta go, Willa. Uh, I mean, uh, whoever you are. [laughs]
What do you know about my mom? And how do you know my name?
translation.es: ¿Qué sabes de mi mamá?¿Y cómo sabes mi nombre?

translation.en: Is it safe?
Where did my mom get this?
Where is he?
-I'm here, I'm here, I'm here. -[screaming]
Finally! [groans]
First, the good news: we've definitely found the necklace.
translation.es: Primero, la buena noticia,encontramos el collar.

translation.en: -Amazing work, Fink. -Great work.
The moldiest cheese for your dinner tonight.
translation.es: Hoy cenarás el queso más mohoso.

translation.en: I was starting to think we couldn't count on you, but you proved me wrong.
translation.es: Pensé que no podíamos contar contigo,pero me equivoqué.

translation.en: You sure did, you little rat-Fink,
translation.es: ¡Seguro que sí, rata soplona,ojos feos, aliento a popó,

translation.en: stinky-eyed, poop-breath, nonsensical, cat-fish whispering nightmare of a rat!
translation.es: ¡Seguro que sí, rata soplona,ojos feos, aliento a popó, sin sentido, rata pesadillezcay mentirosa. Entrégamelo.

translation.en: Hand it over.
translation.es: sin sentido, rata pesadillezcay mentirosa. Entrégamelo.

translation.en: Uh, you might want to save the compliments for after the bad news,
translation.es: Quizá quieras guardar los cumplidospara después de las malas noticias,

translation.en: w-w-which is, um… [clears throat]
She has it.
Okay, you know all those compliments I just gave you? I take them all back.
translation.es: Bien, ¿sabes todos los cumplidosque te acabo de decir? ¡Los retiro!

translation.en: She?
-No. -You don't mean--
translation.es: No. - ¿No querrás decir…?- Sí. Willa Ward tiene el collar.

translation.en: Yep. Willa Ward has the necklace.
translation.es: - ¿No querrás decir…?- Sí. Willa Ward tiene el collar.

translation.en: [exhales] I just had the craziest dream.
I don't think it was a dream.
translation.es: No creo que fuera un sueño.

translation.en: You mean, you actually rode a broomstick?
And there's actually a talking rat?
Are we actually losing our minds?
[mimicking TV presenter] Today, schoolgirls fly on brooms,
translation.es: Hoy, las alumnas vuelan en escobasy confían en ratas parlantes

translation.en: and confide in talking, jewelry-stealing rats
translation.es: Hoy, las alumnas vuelan en escobasy confían en ratas parlantes que roban joyasen un episodio especial de:

translation.en: on a very special episode of
translation.es: que roban joyasen un episodio especial de:

translation.en: Adventures of a Middle Schooler Gone Mad.
translation.es: Las aventuras de la estudiantede secundaria enloquecida.

translation.en: Definitely not your everyday necklace.
translation.es: No es un collar común en definitiva.

translation.en: What isn't your dad telling you?
Let's go find out. [exhales]
[raps] ♪ P-P-Porridge Porridge Willa-Worridge ♪
♪ Come and get your special oatmeal ♪
translation.es: Ven a buscar tu avena especial.

translation.en: Dad, you'll never believe what happened last night.
translation.es: Papá, nunca creerás lo que pasó.

translation.en: I woke up and a talking rat had my necklace.
translation.es: Me despertéy una rata parlante tenía mi collar.

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -Did you hear her say talking rat?
We were chasing it with brooms, and out of the blue,
translation.es: La perseguimos con escobas y, de repente, las escobasempezaron a volar.

translation.en: the brooms started flying everywhere.
translation.es: y, de repente, las escobasempezaron a volar.

translation.en: No way!
Flying brooms and talking rats. What a night. [chuckles]
translation.es: Escobas voladoras y ratas parlantes. ¡Qué noche!

translation.en: Yeah. Willa flew right out the window.
translation.es: Sí. Willa voló por la ventana.

translation.en: And the rat said I look like Mom.
translation.es: Y la rata dijo que me parezco a mamá.

translation.en: Well, they're not wrong there. Beautiful inside and out.
translation.es: En eso no se equivoca,hermosa por dentro y por fuera.

translation.en: You know, maybe I should speak with this talking rat that knew your mom.
translation.es: Quizá debería hablar con esa rata parlanteque conocía a tu mamá.

translation.en: We could swap stories. Isn't that crazy?
Crazy, man!
You don't believe us, do you?
I believe that too much candy and spooky stories make for wacky dreams.
translation.es: Demasiados dulces e historias de miedogeneran sueños locos.

translation.en: I ate five chocolate bars before bed once, and I woke up
translation.es: Una vez comí cinco chocolatesantes de dormir, y estaba seguro de que montéun hipopótamo por la luna,

translation.en: convinced that I rode a hippopotamus across the moon
translation.es: y estaba seguro de que montéun hipopótamo por la luna,

translation.en: to meet the marshmallow queen
translation.es: conocí a la Reina Malvaviscoy comí un cohete

translation.en: so we could eat a rocket ship made out of Jell-O
translation.es: conocí a la Reina Malvaviscoy comí un cohete hecho de gelatinay luego jugué a tres en línea.

translation.en: and then play tic-tac-toe.
translation.es: hecho de gelatinay luego jugué a tres en línea.

translation.en: -Dad. -[dad] Yeah?
This really happened.
Hey, could you guys get me one of those flying brooms?
translation.es: ¿Me traen una de esas escobas?Limpiaría mejor la tienda.

translation.en: Could help me clean up the shop better. Alright. Dig in.
translation.es: ¿Me traen una de esas escobas?Limpiaría mejor la tienda. Bien, coman.

translation.en: -[sighing] -[dad] Speaking of cleaning up…
-[suspenseful music plays] -Nothing like my necklace anywhere. Hm.
translation.es: No hay nada como mi collar.

translation.en: Should we try that weird bookstore with all the crystals and stuff?
translation.es: ¿Deberíamos probar esa rara libreríacon todos esos cristales?

translation.en: -Good idea. -[phone chimes]
-Oh shoot. I'm late. -[Lucy] To be continued?
We'll get to the bottom of it. Until then, just don't touch any brooms?
translation.es: Llegaremos al fondo de esto.Hasta entonces, ¿no toquen ninguna escoba?

translation.en: -Bye. -[Scout] Bye.
We only have one month left till Halloween. Oh, what are you doing reading that book?
translation.es: Solo tenemos un mes para Halloween.¿Qué haces leyendo ese libro?

translation.en: I had a brainwave. What if we had a summon-the-necklace spell?
translation.es: Tuve una idea genial.¿Y si invocamos el hechizo del collar?

translation.en: Uh, we probably would have used it already if we did. I'm just thinking out loud.
translation.es: Probablemente ya lo habríamos usado.Solo pienso en voz alta.

translation.en: Still gonna look.
Okay, will everyone please just stop talking
translation.es: Bien, ¿pueden dejar de hablar un minuto

translation.en: [high-pitched] for one minute so I can hear myself think?
translation.es: Bien, ¿pueden dejar de hablar un minuto para que me oiga pensar? Muchas gracias.

translation.en: Thank you very much.
translation.es: para que me oiga pensar? Muchas gracias.

translation.en: [regular voice] I need to concentrate. We need a plan.
I suggest a potion to turn the girl into a baby bunny.
translation.es: Sugiero una pociónpara convertir a la niña en un conejito.

translation.en: -[Sneak meows] -Clever.
Stupid.
Then Claw could go catch her and bring her up here.
translation.es: Garra podría atraparla y traerla aquí.

translation.en: First we mix the fingernails of a rabid mountain squirrel with the--
translation.es: Primero mezclamos las uñasde una ardilla rabiosa…

translation.en: Why don't we just invite her for tea? Who doesn't like tea?
translation.es: ¿Y si la invitamos a tomar té?¿A quién no le gusta el té?

translation.en: -[blows raspberry] -Um, 12-year-old girls.
translation.es: ¿Y si la invitamos a tomar té?¿A quién no le gusta el té? Son niñas de 12 años. Mejor una soda,un jugo, Frappuccino moca.

translation.en: You might want to try a soda, a juice box, mocha frappuccino…
translation.es: Son niñas de 12 años. Mejor una soda,un jugo, Frappuccino moca.

translation.en: [Fink] I mean, hello!
How should I know? I detest children. They make me break out in hives.
translation.es: ¿Cómo voy a saberlo?Detesto a los niños. Me sacan ronchas.

translation.en: Yeah, right? It's like… [shudders] Alright, let's go with the dumb tea party idea.
translation.es: Sí, ¿no? Es como… Bien,hagamos la tonta idea del té.

translation.en: -Yay. [gasps] What should we wear? -[meows, hisses]
I don't know. Something gross?
Cat amulets… No…
[sighing] Nothing.
Maybe in here.
[sighing] Zilch.
-Mom? -[soft music plays]
This is a real mystery. [sighs]
Special delivery for Miss Willa Ward.
Another talking animal?
-How do you know who I am? -[tense music plays]
"Dear Willa Ward. We've just moved back in town after being away for some time."
translation.es: "Querida Willa Ward: Acabamos de regresara la ciudad después de irnos un tiempo.

translation.en: "We knew your mother well,
translation.es: Conocíamos bien a tu madrey nos encantaría contarte todo sobre ella

translation.en: and would love to tell you all about her and her magical necklace."
translation.es: Conocíamos bien a tu madrey nos encantaría contarte todo sobre ella y su collar mágico.

translation.en: "Please join us after school for tea and treats."
translation.es: Acompáñanos después de la escuelaa tomar té y golosinas.

translation.en: "With love, Wanda and Wilma."
"P.S. We live in the old house at the top of the hill…"
translation.es: P. D. Vivimos en la vieja casaen la cima de la colina".

translation.en: Oh, good morning, Kingsley Jenkins. Nice to see your face.
translation.es: Buenos días, Kingsley Jenkins.Qué gusto verte.

translation.en: Oh! Good morning, Willa Ward. Welcome to class.
translation.es: Buenos días, Willa Ward. Bienvenidaa clase, un nuevo día de aventura.

translation.en: -A new day of adventure. [gasps] -[Willa] Morning, Ms. Juniper.
translation.es: Buenos días, Willa Ward. Bienvenidaa clase, un nuevo día de aventura. Buen día, Sra. Juniper.

translation.en: May I ask…
[softly] Where did you get that necklace?
Why?
Oh, no reason exactly. [chuckling] Just curious.
It was my mom's.
Great! Good chat.
Okay.
Nice necklace!
You getting ready for Halloween?
Going as…
a fashion disaster?
[girl] Oh, wait.
I guess that wouldn't be a costume.
translation.es: Supongo que no sería un disfraz.

translation.en: Since jealousy is actually a compliment, Blaine, I'm simply going to say thank you.
translation.es: Como los celos son un cumplido,Blaine, simplemente te agradeceré.

translation.en: I love it too!
[Willa] Secret stair spot. Meeting at lunch. Super important.
translation.es: Lugar secreto en la escalera.Junta en el almuerzo. Superimportante.

translation.en: [sighs] Where is it?
[Willa] "Please join us after school for tea and treats."
translation.es: "Acompáñanos después de la escuelaa tomar té y golosinas.

translation.en: "With love, Wanda and Wilma."
-What? -[Lucy] What?
I know. What?
Are you going?
Of course she is. You're going, right?
translation.es: Claro que sí. Vas a ir, ¿no?

translation.en: Of course I am. They said they know about my mom, and this necklace.
translation.es: Claro que sí. Dijeron que sabían de mi mamáy de este collar.

translation.en: You're brave to go up there alone. You know, I would never go up there.
translation.es: Eres valiente al ir sola. No, yo nunca iría.Conoces las historias, ¿cierto?

translation.en: You do know the stories, right?
translation.es: No, yo nunca iría.Conoces las historias, ¿cierto?

translation.en: -That's why I'm not going alone. -Who are you going with?
translation.es: Por eso no iré sola. ¿Con quién irás?

translation.en: I'll pack some snacks. Nothing too sugary. The last 24 hours have been weird enough.
translation.es: Empacaré bocadillos. Nada muy dulce.Las últimas 24 horas han sido muy raras.

translation.en: Definitely.
Remember, I have to be home by dinner to babysit Sawyer.
translation.es: Debo ir a casa para la cenay cuidar a Sawyer.

translation.en: It shouldn't take too long. It's just tea, right?
translation.es: No debería tomar tanto tiempo.Es solo té, ¿no?

translation.en: Come on, let's do this.
[boy] Do what?
-[Willa] Nothing. -Nobody.
Hey, Wyatt. You guys up to something exciting?
No. [sighing] Totally boring.
Boring.
Speak for yourself, Lucy. I'd call it intriguing.
translation.es: Habla por ti, Lucy.Yo diría que es intrigante.

translation.en: -I mean-- -Be quiet.
Yep. Boring. So boring.
Ugh, bummer. I was looking for something fun to do after school today.
translation.es: Qué fastidio.Quería hacer algo divertido hoy.

translation.en: See ya.
A talking crow is so not boring.
translation.es: Un cuervo parlante no es aburrido.

translation.en: Hey, Willa. What are you doing here?
Hey, Dad. Just wanted to let you know I'm going to be late today.
translation.es: Papá, quería decirteque llegaré una hora tarde.

translation.en: -I'm going to tea with, um, uh-- -Oh, okay, Willa. [chuckles]
translation.es: - Voy a tomar el té con…- Bien, Willa.

translation.en: Hey, little guy. I'll see you at dinner, right?
translation.es: ¡Oye, pequeño! Nos vemos en la cena, ¿no?

translation.en: -[Willa] Okay, bye. -Don't worry, they're just eyeballs.
translation.es: - Adiós.- Está bien. No te preocupes, son solo ojos.

translation.en: Ready?
Why are we taking the spookiest possible route to get there?
translation.es: ¿Por qué tomamos la ruta más espeluznante?

translation.en: You know, the legend says these woods are the Haunted Hills,
translation.es: La leyenda dice que estos bosquesson las Colinas Embrujadas,

translation.en: cursed by the three witches of Winding Way themselves.
translation.es: maldecidas por las tres brujasde Camino Sinuoso.

translation.en: I heard that witches have lived in that old house for centuries.
translation.es: Oí que las brujas han vividoen esa vieja casa por siglos.

translation.en: Well, it's a good thing we're brave, right?
translation.es: Bueno, qué bueno que somos valientes, ¿no?

translation.en: Come on. None of that is real.
translation.es: Vamos. Nada de eso es real.

translation.en: -Besides, this isn't that spooky. -Yeah.
translation.es: - Además, esto no es tan espeluznante.- Sí.

translation.en: [Willa] They're probably just old ladies
who happen to live in a really creepy old house.
translation.es: que viven en una casa muy espeluznante.

translation.en: Just that right there sounded like the setup for a spooky movie.
translation.es: Eso sonó como el escenariode una película de miedo.

translation.en: [hesitant] Yeah. What could go wrong?
Famous last words.
[Scout] Defs the beginning of a spooky movie.
translation.es: En definitiva,el inicio de una película de miedo.

translation.en: Well, no time like the present.
translation.es: No hay nada como el presente.

translation.en: -Hello? -[soft music plays]
Hello?
Is anyone home?
I hope you don't mind. I brought my friends.
translation.es: Espero que no les moleste. Traje a mis amigas.

translation.en: -[dramatic music plays] -Willa! So nice to see you again.
translation.es: Willa, qué bueno verte de nuevo.

translation.en: Again?
We knew you when you were just a baby.
translation.es: Te conocimos cuando eras una bebé.Una linda bebé, con la piel…

translation.en: Oh, such a cute baby, with the skin, and the teeth, and the hairs, and things.
translation.es: Te conocimos cuando eras una bebé.Una linda bebé, con la piel… los dientes, el pelo y demás.

translation.en: [Wilma] And Lucy, Scout.
-Welcome. -[chuckles]
How did you know…?
Oh, just a simple seeing spell, nothing fancy.
translation.es: Un simple hechizo para ver,nada sofisticado.

translation.en: -Spell? -Ix-nay on the agic-may.
Please, sit down.
So, you knew my mom?
Oh! Knew her? [laughs]
Knew her? [laughs]
She was, uh, we were like…
That. We were best friends. We were just real close.
-You couldn't keep the three of us apart. -[Wanda laughs]
translation.es: No podían separarnos a las tres.

translation.en: Well, until Neil-- [shrieks, laughs]
Until nothing. Until nothing. [strained laughter]
She was a real sweetheart, you know, heart of gold.
translation.es: Era muy linda, tenía un gran corazón.

translation.en: [laughs] Don't be shy.
[chuckling] Well, this isn't much of a tea party, is it?
[laughs] Kidding. No, because there are no treats, and, um, no tea.
translation.es: Es broma. No, porque no hay dulces ni té.

translation.en: But I can change that, so I'm going to. Alright? [laughs]
translation.es: Pero puedo cambiar eso, lo haré, ¿sí?

translation.en: -[gasping] -Amazing.
What are you doing?
[strained] You know that children love candy, so just play along.
translation.es: A los niños les encantan los dulces,sígueme la corriente.

translation.en: -What's happening? -Now what is happening? [laughs]
-[Wanda chuckles] -Isn't this fun?
So much-- [gags]
So much fun. [laughs]
Now Scout: what is your favorite treat in the whole wide world?
translation.es: Ahora, Scout, ¿cuál estu dulce favorito en todo el mundo?

translation.en: Cotton candy. Cotton candy. [gags]
Yum.
Edible chair? What? This might be the best day of my life.
translation.es: ¿Silla comestible? ¿Qué?Este podría ser el mejor día de mi vida.

translation.en: Lucy, what would you like to have at tea for three?
translation.es: ¡Lucy! ¿Qué te gustaría tomarcon el té para tres?

translation.en: Well, I've always dreamed of it raining chocolate.
translation.es: Bueno, siempre soñécon una lluvia de chocolate.

translation.en: -[laughs] -[Wanda] Oh, no.
-[Willa] Delicious! -[Lucy] Whoa!
Now Willa, what about you, my dear?
translation.es: Ahora, Willa, ¿qué hay de ti, querida?

translation.en: I want to know about my mom,
so maybe we could have more talk, less treats.
translation.es: Entonces… tal vez podríamos hablar másy comer menos dulces.

translation.en: -Willa, are you crazy? -Speak for yourself.
She's here. What are we waiting for?
Let's get that thing off her.
Well, um, you know, maybe we should just give them a moment to enjoy the tea party,
translation.es: Bueno, tal vez deberíamos darlesun momento para disfrutar del té…

translation.en: for-for a moment.
Fink, Sneak, shut up!
Wait a second. That's that rat from last night.
translation.es: ¡Espera un segundo!¡Esa es la rata de anoche!

translation.en: [gasps] Uh, I think we should go.
-No. -[ominous music plays]
[laughs] Let's cut to the chase, shall we?
We want your necklace.
I know it would be nice for you to have it, but what good is it to you, really?
translation.es: Sé que sería lindo que lo tuvieras,pero ¿de qué te sirve?

translation.en: I mean, whereas to us, getting it back would be, I don't know, Wilma, what would you say?
translation.es: Para nosotras, recuperarlo sería,no sé, Wilma, ¿qué dirías,

translation.en: Like, um, magnificently splendorifically terrifical?
-Yes, I'd say exactly that. -Mm-hm.
No. It was my mom's and she wanted me to have it.
translation.es: ¡No! Era de mi mamá y quería que lo tuviera.

translation.en: You invited me here to tell me about her, and I haven't heard one thing.
translation.es: Me invitaron para hablar de ellay no he oído nada.

translation.en: So, we're leaving.
Uh, no you're not.
Aw, that's a shame, because there was an easy way to do this,
translation.es: Es una pena porque habíauna manera fácil de hacer esto,

translation.en: and now, [laughs] what do you know, there's a hard way.
translation.es: y ahora hay una manera difícil.

translation.en: I mean, we didn't want to have to play the witch card, but you've kind of forced our hands.
translation.es: No queríamos usar lo de ser brujas,pero nos obligan.

translation.en: -[cackling] -Witches! [screams] See? I told you those stories are true.
translation.es: ¡Brujas!Les dije que esas historias eran ciertas.

translation.en: You want to know something about your mom?
She was too trusting.
Just. Like. You.
-Over here! -[screaming]
-Oh, no. Um, here. Hide. -[Wanda] It's time! Witches coming for ya!
translation.es: - Oh, no.- ¡Alto! ¡Aquí, escóndanse! ¡Las brujas vienen por ustedes!

translation.en: [Wilma, singsongy] We just want to talk to you.
[whimpers] They're coming.
[Willa] Hide. In here.
-[ominous music plays] -[singsongy] Girls! Where did you go?
-[cackling] -You can run, but you can't hide.
This way.
Some kind of potion room.
translation.es: Una especie de sala de pociones.

translation.en: I'm calling my mom. I don't care if I get grounded--
translation.es: ¡Llamaré a mi mamá!No me importa si me castigan…

translation.en: Forever. There's no signal.
Lucy, your face feels more bony than usual.
translation.es: Lucy, tu cara se siente más huesuda.

translation.en: -You're not touching my face, Scout. -Sure I am.
translation.es: - No tocas mi cara, Scout.- Claro que sí.

translation.en: That's your cheek, and now I'm sticking my finger into your eye--
translation.es: Esa es tu mejillay ahora te meto el dedo en el ojo.

translation.en: [Scout] Into your eye?!
-[Wilma] Oh, girls? -[gasps] Oh no.
[screams] Find a potion!
-Do something! -[wails]
Nope. Upside down potion.
Flying potion.
Hiding potion! Aha!
Here.
"When ye wish to hide From the troubles on the outside
Drink this potion with open mind And ye shall be the… feline kind?"
translation.es: con mente abierta esta poción beberásy en felino te convertirás".

translation.en: Wait. Does that mean…?
-[tinkling] -Oh no.
-You're-- -I have paws.
Oh, no. Oh, no. Oh, no.
And a tail!
[Wilma] Yoo-hoo! Girls.
Run!
Run? I have to learn to walk with four legs before I can run!
translation.es: Debo aprender a caminarcon cuatro patas antes de correr.

translation.en: [Wanda] I won't let them get away.
-[Wanda] Where did they get to now? -[Wilma] Sure are slimy little things.
translation.es: ¿A dónde se fueron? Son pequeñas cosas babosas.

translation.en: -[Willa] Quick. Under here. -[dramatic music plays]
I've looked everywhere. They're gone.
translation.es: Busqué en todas partes. Se fueron.

translation.en: And I looked everywhere you looked right after you did, just to be sure.
translation.es: Y busqué donde buscastesolo para estar segura.

translation.en: You know how cats can fit into the smallest places?
translation.es: ¿Saben que los gatos cabenen los lugares más pequeños?

translation.en: You want us to go in there? Look at the size of that spider.
translation.es: - ¿Quieres que entremos ahí?- ¡Mira el tamaño de esa araña!

translation.en: [scoffs] I'll stay here and meet my fate, thank you very much.
translation.es: Me quedaré aquíy enfrentaré mi destino, gracias.

translation.en: [Willa] Shoo, you big, hairy spider. We're coming in.
translation.es: Vete, araña grande y peluda.Vamos a entrar.

translation.en: [Scout] Come on, Lucy. We don't have time to be scared.
translation.es: Vamos, Lucy.No tenemos tiempo para asustarnos.

translation.en: [witches scream] Where are they?
[gasps] A tail.
A tail. [gasps] That means they've gotten into the hiding potion.
translation.es: Una cola.Tomaron la poción para esconderse.

translation.en: -[gasps] -We need to go outside! We need Claw!
translation.es: Tenemos que salir. Necesitamos a Garra.

translation.en: -Claw! -Claw!
[Willa] We have to keep moving. We cannot be scaredy cats.
translation.es: Debemos seguir adelante. No podemos ser gatos asustadizos.

translation.en: I am a scaredy cat, though.
Claw!
-Oh, hey! How's the party going? -They snuck out in the drain.
translation.es: ¡Hola! ¿Cómo va el té? Se escabulleron por el desagüe.Avísanos de inmediato si las ves.

translation.en: Let us know immediately if you see them, okay?
translation.es: Se escabulleron por el desagüe.Avísanos de inmediato si las ves.

translation.en: -Uh… sure? -Do not let them get away.
translation.es: - No…- Claro. …las dejes escapar.Vuela el cuervo y no irán lejos.

translation.en: As the crow flies, they can't have gone far.
translation.es: …las dejes escapar.Vuela el cuervo y no irán lejos.

translation.en: You're a crow, so you should know. Okay, stop looking at me.
translation.es: Eres un cuervo, deberías saberlo.Deja de mirarme.

translation.en: -[caws] -Fly!
-Yes. Wilma? -Yes?
Warm up the cauldron.
Now?
Yes, Wilma, now.
Cat respect meter just went way up.
translation.es: El medidor de respeto de gatos subió.

translation.en: That was so claustrophobic.
And filthy. Ew.
-[dramatic music plays] -Here, kitties, kitties, kitties!
Well, I spy with my little crow eye… [caws]
translation.es: Bueno, espío con mi ojo de cuervo…

translation.en: It's that creepy crow! Shoo! Go away! Leave us alone!
translation.es: Es ese cuervo espeluznante. ¡Vete! ¡Déjanos en paz!

translation.en: [caws] Not until you hand over the amulet.
Run!
-[bubbling] -[Wanda] Yes, yes, yes…
Oh yes, oh yes!
Claw's got them. Wilma! Claw's got them!
translation.es: Garra las tiene. ¡Wilma! Garra las tiene.

translation.en: We got 'em!
Fog and bog and city smog And nice little families out for a jog
translation.es: Niebla, pantano y contaminación,familias en circulación,

translation.en: Envelop the children who are now cats And, oh, they'll be scared like, like rats
translation.es: manda a las niñas que ahora gatas sony se asustarán como unas ratas, ¿sí?

translation.en: [high-pitched] Meow! It's foggy, I can't see. [normal voice] It's really working, Wilma, it's working!
[Willa] What is this place?
Super creepy, that's what.
In case we don't make it back, I just want to say
translation.es: Por si no regresamos, solo quiero decir

translation.en: that I was 100% right about the witches this whole time.
translation.es: que estuve 100 % en lo ciertosobre las brujas.

translation.en: Where's all this fog coming from? I can't see my paws in front of my face!
translation.es: ¿De dónde viene esa niebla?No veo mis patas frente a mi cara.

translation.en: This is so not fun anymore.
Honestly, it really hasn't been fun since the candy part,
translation.es: Para ser honesta, no ha sido divertidodesde la parte de los dulces.

translation.en: and even that felt a tad unsanitary.
translation.es: E incluso eso se sintió un poco insalubre.

translation.en: -[dramatic music plays] -Hello, girls.
Nice work, Claw.
An extra portion of kitten stew just for you!
translation.es: Una porción extrade estofado de gatito solo para ti.

translation.en: Aha! Hello, kitten stew. [caws]
One thing you three might have overlooked.
translation.es: Algo que ustedes tres pasaron por alto,

translation.en: [Wilma] Witches love eating cat stew!
translation.es: las brujas aman el estofado de gato,

translation.en: Especially on a stormy night.
translation.es: en especial, en una noche de tormenta.

translation.en: Eat someone else then, because we're out of here.
translation.es: Come a alguien másporque nos vamos de aquí. ¡Corran!

translation.en: -[Willa] Run! -[Lucy] I am not a snack.
translation.es: Come a alguien másporque nos vamos de aquí. ¡Corran! ¡No soy un bocadillo!

translation.en: [groans] I forgot how slippery cats are.
translation.es: Olvidé lo escurridizos que son los gatos.

translation.en: But not how tasty.
translation.es: Pero no lo sabrosos que son.

translation.en: -[Wilma] Whoo! -[Wanda] You go that way.
-[Wilma exhales, clicks tongue] -Oh, no. Oh, no. Oh, no.
[sighs] Where could they be?
Don't move a whisker.
Oh, no, guys. I have to…
-Please don't sneeze. -[Lucy makes pre-sneeze noises]
-[pre-sneeze noises] -[Willa] Please, please hold it in.
[Willa] Hold it in.
-Bless you. -Thanks.
-We need to get out of here. -Now's our chance.
Lucy, wait!
[cackles] Boo.
Not so fast this time.
Now the hiding's said and done Return the form that they came from
translation.es: Cuando de esconderse terminen,a las formas que tenían volverán.

translation.en: We're human again. We're human!
-Hey, hi. -Yes! Still dangerous witches, not so happy.
translation.es: Hola, hay brujas peligrosas,no es un momento feliz.

translation.en: Looks like you girls have been rooted out.
And it's going to be a lot harder for you to escape
now that you're just "pesky little girls" and not cats.
translation.es: ahora que son "niñas molestas" y no gatos.

translation.en: Oh, I have an idea. Why don't we call this whole thing off, and you just, I don't know, hand over the necklace.
translation.es: Tengo una idea. ¿Por quéno cancelamos esto y nos das el collar?

translation.en: Just grab it.
You know as well as I do, it needs to be given, not taken.
translation.es: Sabes tan bien como yoque debe darse, no tomarse.

translation.en: Well, in that case, hand over the amulet. Now!
translation.es: Bueno, en ese caso, danos el amuleto. ¡Ahora!

translation.en: No! My mom would never want it in the hands of you bad witches.
translation.es: ¡No! Mi mamá nunca lo querríaen manos de brujas malas.

translation.en: -I'm gonna get my dad and he'll-- -[laughing]
translation.es: Voy a buscar a mi papá y él…

translation.en: Did you hear that, Wilma? She's going to get "Neil" to come help.
translation.es: ¿Oíste eso, Wilma?Buscará la ayuda de Neil.

translation.en: -[Wanda] Neil! -[laughing]
My mom was right. Chocolate alleviates stress.
translation.es: Mamá tenía razón.El chocolate alivia el estrés.

translation.en: Good thing I loaded up at the tea party. Seriously? You're eating candy right now?
translation.es: - Qué bueno que me abastecí durante el té.- ¿En serio? ¿Estás comiendo dulces?

translation.en: Candy? [gags]
The candy!
They can't stand candy. Literally!
Take that!
Let's get out of here, fast.
-Ooh! Oh no. Burning! -[Wilma whimpers, yelps]
-[screams] Stop! -[dramatic music plays]
We made it.
-[Scout] Oh my goodness. -Hey! Alright, I got a signal!
Oh, good.
Okay, I am so grounded.
So much for those stories being made up, huh, Scout?
I mean, no 11-year-old really believes in witches.
translation.es: Digo, ningún niño de 11 añoscree en las brujas.

translation.en: How was I supposed to know?
I have a feeling that's not the last we'll be seeing of those two. [sighs]
translation.es: Tengo la sensación de que no serála última vez que las veremos.

translation.en: As scary as tonight was, it was also pretty cool to be a cat.
translation.es: Aunque esta noche fue aterradora, también fue genial ser un gato.

translation.en: -[soft music plays] -Think we can do it again? [in unison] Seriously?
-Too soon? -[in unison] Yes!
And there's no way I'm going back into that house to get more potion. Except…
translation.es: Y no hay forma de que regrese a esa casaa buscar más poción. Excepto que…

translation.en: Wait a second. I forgot to put it back on the shelf.
translation.es: esperen un segundo. Olvidé ponerla en el estante.

translation.en: I think seventh grade just got a lot more interesting.
translation.es: Creo que el séptimo gradoacaba de ponerse más interesante.

translation.en: Hey, guys? Thanks for being such great friends today and sticking by me.
translation.es: Oigan, chicas, gracias por sertan buenas amigas y por apoyarme.

translation.en: You guys are like the sisters I never had. [chuckles]
translation.es: Son como las hermanas que nunca tuve.

translation.en: [in a spooky voice] The Sisters of Winding Way! Whoo…
-[laughing] -Wisters!
The Wisters of Winding Way! [laughing]
-The Wisters! -[Willa] Come on.
Heyo.
Dad!
What would you say if I told you I got chased by witches today
translation.es: ¿Qué dirías si te contaraque hoy me persiguieron brujas

translation.en: and turned into a cat?
[inhales] Well I would say, sweetheart,
you don't have to make up stories to get my attention.
translation.es: que no debes inventar historiaspara llamar mi atención.

translation.en: You always have my attention.
Thought it would be something like that.
-[soft music plays] -Do you know where Mom got this?
No. She just always had it, ever since I knew her.
translation.es: No. Siempre lo tuvo desde que la conocí.

translation.en: She used to say she was a different person before she and I met and we had you.
translation.es: Decía que era otra persona antes de quenos conociéramos y te tuviéramos.

translation.en: Maybe she got it from one of the [spooky voice] witches of Winding Way.
translation.es: Tal vez lo obtuvode una de las brujas de Camino Sinuoso.

translation.en: Bedtime.
You want the lights on or off?
On.
Okay. Love you, kiddo.
What?
"Dear Willa." "If you're reading this, that means you have my necklace,
translation.es: "Querida Willa: Si estás leyendo esto,significa que tienes mi collar.

translation.en: and I think you're probably wondering if I was a witch."
translation.es: Y creo que te estarás preguntandosi era una bruja.

translation.en: "I was."
[Willow] I was a witch, Willa.
[sighs] And if I know my curious…
translation.es: Y si conozco a mi curiosa,

translation.en: pure-hearted, beautiful baby girl…
translation.es: pura de corazón y hermosa hija,

translation.en: …I know what you're thinking. [exhales]
"How could my mom be a witch, and does this make me a witch too?"
translation.es: "¿Cómo es que mi mamá era bruja,y eso me convierte en bruja también?".

translation.en: Just because you are mine…
"…doesn't make you a witch."
"Believing in magic does, and you can be a witch."
translation.es: creer en la magia sí. "Y puedes ser una bruja".

translation.en: A good witch,
if you choose to believe in the values of courage,
translation.es: si eliges creer en los valores del valor,

translation.en: kindness, and wisdom.
"Magic can be used for bad things,
translation.es: "La magia se puede usar para cosas malas.

translation.en: but it can also be used for very, very good things."
translation.es: Pero también se puede usarpara cosas muy buenas".

translation.en: You taught me that, Willa.
And now that you have my necklace, you have that choice.
translation.es: Y ahora que tienes mi collar, tienes esa opción.

translation.en: There is something very important you must do, though.
translation.es: Pero hay algo muy importanteque debes hacer.

translation.en: "In order to harness the power of the amulet,
and keep yourself safe…"
…you will need my secret witch book.
translation.es: Necesitarás mi libro secreto de brujería.

translation.en: I hid it for you in case this day ever came.
translation.es: Lo escondí por si llegaba este día.

translation.en: There will be obstacles along the way to finding it…
translation.es: Habrá obstáculosen el camino para encontrarlo…

translation.en: "…to make sure it ends up in the right hands."
translation.es: "…y asegurar que acabeen las manos correctas".

translation.en: Your hands. [sighs]
I love you…
with all that I am.
"And I am always with you."
Closer than you know.
translation.es: Más cerca de lo que crees.

translation.en: [crying] "Take good care of Dad."
[voice breaking] You are my heart.
"Mom."
